DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability immunogenicity 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate ( 13vPnC ) vaccine compare Prevenar ( 7vPnC ) , give concomitantly routine paediatric vaccination Spain .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating 13-Valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Healthy Infants
DOC.criteria: Healthy 2monthold infant Available entire study period Exclusion criterion : Previous vaccination vaccine start study Known contraindication vaccination
